subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Boston center Patrice Bergeron lost consciousness and was taken from the ice on a stretcher yesterday during the first period of visiting Philadelphia’s 2-1 victory after he was hammered face-first into the boards by Flyers defenseman Randy Jones.
